column2: Please Identify the most important factor underpinning your decision whether to protect or not during the biosecurity game
column5: I thought that other players would not protect, so I didn't see why I should either.
column6: I thought other players would protect and I could benefit without having to protect myself.
column7: I tried to avoid incurring monetary losses.
column8: I thought the other players would choose to protect, so I protected as well.
column9: I thought that choosing to protect was the right thing to do, regardless of what other players decided
column10: I didn't know what others were going to do and thought it was worth the risk of taking protective action

column2: During the biosecurity game, how concerned were you about incurring a loss? (1 = not at all concerned, 7 = very concerned).
During the biosecurity game, how concerned were you that other players would choose to not engage in protection? (1 = not at all concerned, 7 = very concerned).
Please indicate your trust level of your group members overall (1= Little Amount of Trust, 6 = A lot of Trust)
column7: 3 - There was a moderate level of trust
column8: 4 - Trust was held, would occasionally break
column9: 5 - Trust was held most of the time
column10: 6 - There was a lot of Trust, Trust was held all the time

column2: Most People are basically good and kind.
Most People are trustful of others
Most people will respond in kind when they are trusted by others.
Most people will tell a lie when they can benefit from doing so.
Those devoted to unselfish causes are often exploited by others.
Some people do not cooperate because they pursue only their own short-term self-interest. Thus things that can be done well if people cooperate often fail because of these people.
What is your residential suburb and postcode?

column3: Allowed types: text, integer, age, choice (so just type in possible options in the following columns)
Can add more choices eg choice6 choice7, the program will pick up on it, HAVE to specify number of choices in #choices
